frontmatter.title: Hello World
frontmatter.summary: My first post on my brand new blog. A statement of intent.

node.html:
Welcome to my blog, based in Gatsby. You are reading my first post, written in a markdown file and hosted in github pages.

The creation of this post is part of Challenge 1, part of #100DaysOfGatsby challenges.

Stay tuned to read more posts about Javascript, React and much more things.
